Material used.Description: Human embryonic kidney cells (HEK-293T) were maintained and transfected with plasmid DNA encoding wild-type or Gly2385Arg mutant LRRK2 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: Overexpression of the Gly2385Arg variant in HEK-293T cells resulted in a higher rate of apoptosis and cell death under oxidative stress conditions (0.8 mM H2O2).

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed in multiple sets of biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Chi-square test, Student t-test, Logistic regression analysis
